name: Junkyard Mechanic
description: A grease-stained engineer who trusts improvised explosives and jury-rigged tech more than people. If it can't be fixed with a wrench or a shotgun, it's not worth fixing.
level_up: Hoard components to keep your gear serviceable. Use mines to cover your extraction retreat. Don't engage in fair fights; blow them up before they see you.

name: Corporate Liquidator
description: An ex-corporate hitman who treats the wasteland like a hostile boardroom. Professional, detached, and prefers to solve problems from two post codes away.
level_up: Your armor is paper-thin; do not get hit. Invest heavily in Sneak to ensure you always shoot first. If you break stealth, relocate or extract immediately.

name: Grognak Larper
description: Whether due to radiation madness or just too many comic books, you believe you are Grognak the Barbarian reincarnate. Bullets are for cowards.
level_up: CHARGE. You have max health and strength; use corners to force enemies into melee range. Hoard meats and meds, as you will be taking damage constantly.

name: The Glow-Worm
description: You've spent too long near the reactor. You glow in the dark, you cough up blood, and you love the smell of ozone. Radiation is just spicy air to you.
level_up: Energy weapons are rare and ammo is scarce; scavenge tech locations specifically. Use your high endurance to take shortcuts through irradiated zones others avoid.

name: Smooth-Talker
description: You can't shoot straight, but you can talk a raider out of their power armor. You aim to get rich in town so you can hire better guns to do the fighting for you.
level_up: Avoid combat at all costs. Loot high-value-to-weight items. Use your wealth to buy Lunchboxes and Flares to survive raids you have no business being in.

name: Chem-Head
description: Reality is boring. Combat is better in slow motion. You live for the high, and you fight like a demon when the Jet kicks in. The withdrawal is the only thing you fear.
level_up: Pop chems BEFORE the fight, not during. Your stats are mediocre until you dope up, then you are a god. Hoard Addictol or pay doctors frequently.

name: Vault Patriot
description: You remember the guidance of the Overseer. You keep your jumpsuit clean, your pistol oiled, and your moral compass rigid. The wasteland is messy; you are here to organize it.
level_up: The ultimate balanced build. Adapt to the loot you find. Use Science to hack terminals for easy loot and Speech to navigate quests.

name: Heavy Trooper
description: Subtlety is for people without miniguns. You are a walking tank designed to lay down suppressing fire and soak up damage.
level_up: Ammo is your lifeblood. Prioritize scavenging raids to keep your heavy weapons fed. Stand your ground and let the armor do its job.

name: Railway Rifleman
description: A lover of steam and steel. You prefer weapons that pin enemies to walls and armor made from locomotive scrap.
level_up: Recover your railway spikes whenever possible. Focus on limb damage to cripple targets before finishing them off.

name: The Pyromaniac
description: Some people want to set the world on fire. You just want to set the person standing in front of you on fire.
level_up: Close the distance and burn them out. Fire weapons consume fuel quickly, so carry a backup melee weapon for when the tank runs dry.

name: The Pugilist
description: An underground pit fighter looking for the next bout. You rely on brass knuckles, technique, and a very high pain threshold.
level_up: Weave in and out of combat. Use VATS to land critical strikes in melee. You save a fortune on ammo, so spend those caps on armor.

name: The Ninja
description: A silent assassin influenced by pre-war holotapes. You strike from the shadows with blades and vanish before the body hits the floor.
level_up: Critical hits are mandatory. If you aren't sneaking, you're dying. Pick your targets carefully and never fight a group in the open.

name: The Demolitionist
description: If it clicks, beeps, or ticks, you know how to make it explode. You control the battlefield with mines and grenades.
level_up: Lure enemies into kill zones. Plant mines at choke points before starting a fight. Don't blow yourself up.

name: The Field Medic
description: A former combat medic who knows that the best way to prevent casualties is to eliminate the source of the injury.
level_up: Your high intelligence helps you level faster. Keep your health topped off and use Science to access supply caches others miss.

name: The Cowboy
description: A rugged individualist inspired by western holotapes. Revolvers, lever-action rifles, and a hat are non-negotiable.
level_up: Focus on high-damage, slow-firing weapons. Use dynamite (explosives) to flush enemies out of cover.

name: Energy Commando
description: A tech-savvy trooper who salvaged high-end energy weapons. Precision and power over spray-and-pray.
level_up: Energy ammo is heavy and rare. Make every shot count. Use Science to recycle energy cells if possible.

name: Scavenger King
description: You can smell a bottle cap from a mile away. You aren't the strongest or the smartest, but you always come home with the loot.
level_up: Unlock everything. Carry as much as you can. Avoid combat to preserve the condition of your loot.

name: Paranoid Prepper
description: They said you were crazy for hoarding canned beans and shotgun shells. Who's crazy now?
level_up: You are self-sufficient. Maintain your gear aggressively and keep a stockpile of food and water for long raids.

name: Smoothskin Ghoul
description: You aren't actually a ghoul, but you've lived in the metro tunnels so long you might as well be. Darkness is your friend.
level_up: Stick to the shadows and tunnels. You thrive in low-light environments. Use stealth to bypass tough surface encounters.

name: Tunnel Rat
description: Small, fast, and vicious. You prefer fighting in the cramped corridors of the vaults and sewers.
level_up: Use close-quarters weapons like knives and SMGs. Speed is your armor.

name: Nuka-Cola Fanatic
description: You are obsessed with the sugary nectar of the pre-war world. You are jittery, fast, and possibly diabetic.
level_up: Collect Nuka-Grenades and Quantum. Your playstyle is erratic and energetic. Sprint from cover to cover.

name: Baseball Fury
description: You wear the uniform of a dead sport and enforce the rules with a heavy bat. Strike three, you're out.
level_up: Close the gap with grenades, then finish them with the bat. Athletics and speed are key.

name: Alien Conspiracy Theorist
description: The truth is out there. You wield technology you barely understand to fight enemies you can barely see.
level_up: Seek out alien crash sites and high-tech loot. Your weapon breaks often, so keep Repair high.

name: Drunk Caravan Guard
description: A half-sober escort who can't quite remember which crate was important but never forgets who shot at it. Warning: Starts with addictions.
level_up: Manage your withdrawal symptoms. You are tough but inaccurate. Rely on volume of fire and brute force.

name: Clueless Tourist
description: A pre-war enthusiast who thought a sightseeing tour of the wasteland was a good idea. Somehow still alive despite having no combat training.
level_up: Run away. Your combat stats are terrible. Rely on finding loot and avoiding enemies entirely. Good luck.

name: Pacifist Doomsayer
description: Insists the world is ending any minute now and would really prefer not to shoot anyone about it. Refuses to specialize in weapons.
level_up: You are a non-combatant in a war zone. Use companions (if available) or stealth. Healing items are your only defense.

name: RobCo Hacker
description: You prefer screens to faces. Why fight when you can reprogram a turret to do it for you?
level_up: Hack everything. Disable robot enemies instantly. Use Energy Weapons as a backup for biological threats.

name: The Grim Reaper
description: Death follows you. You rely on supernatural luck and critical hits to decimate foes before they can react.
level_up: VATS is your best friend. Maximize critical hit chance. You are fragile, so ensure your first hit kills.

name: Cannibal Chef
description: Meat is meat, right? You have a refined palate and a terrifying proficiency with knives.
level_up: Your enemies are also your lunch. This saves on stimpaks but makes you unpopular. Get close and carve.

name: Vault Reject
description: You didn't leave the Vault; you were kicked out. You have no supplies, no training, and everyone hates you.
level_up: This is Hard Mode. You start with nothing. Scavenge what you can and pray.
